trans-unit.source: Provides digital rights management services for encrypting and decrypting protected content.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 권한 관리 서비스를 암호화 및 해독할 보호 된 콘텐츠를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: CryptoProvider is created as a result of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A> method when binding a rights managed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: CryptoProvider는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>메서드는 권한 관리 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> 에</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> 바인딩할 때</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A> 결과로 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, CryptoProvider is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 다른와 마찬가지로 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>형식의 CryptoProvider이 완전 신뢰 응용 프로그램에서 사용할 수만 있습니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 블록 크기를 바이트 단위로 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*BlockSize bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: `clearText` 및 `cipherText` 에 전달 된 버퍼 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>및 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>n 여야 합니다 * BlockSize 바이트 길이가 여기서 ' n '은 1 보다 크거나 정수입니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `false`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>은 `false`, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> 에 전달 된 버퍼와 같은 길이 여야</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> 에 전달 된 버퍼</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `true`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of BlockSize bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>은 `true`에 전달 된 버퍼 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>에 전달 된 버퍼에서 다른 길이가 수 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(모든 버퍼 크기 여전히 있어야 길이 블록 크기를 바이트의 배수).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BlockSize of 1 indicates that the cipher is a stream cipher; a BlockSize of 2 or greater indicates a block cipher.
trans-unit.target: 1의 블록 크기는 암호화 스트림 암호; 임을 나타냅니다. 2 이상의 블록 크기는 블록 암호화를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 암호 블록 크기 (바이트)에서입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default block size for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] is 8.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 기본 블록 크기 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] 8입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection listing the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: 확인에 통과 하 고 사용자에 게 부여 하는 권한을 나열 하는 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection enumerating the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: 확인 및를 전달 하는 권한을 열거 하는 컬렉션은 사용자에 게 부여 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 사용자에 게 암호 해독 권한이 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: CanDecrypt returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user read access rights such as View, Edit, Print, or Owner.
trans-unit.target: CanDecrypt 반환 **true** 경우는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>이 바인딩된 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>보기, 편집, 인쇄 또는 소유자와 같은 읽기 액세스 권한을 사용자에 게 부여 합니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to decrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** 경우는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> 해독; 사용자 권한을 부여, **false**합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 사용자에 게 암호화 권한이 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A> returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user write access rights such as Edit or Owner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>반환 **true** 경우는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>이 바인딩된 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>편집 또는 소유자와 같은 쓰기 액세스 권한을 사용자에 게 부여 합니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense></xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to encrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** 경우는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> 암호화;에 대 한 사용자 권한을 부여, **false**합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> can accept buffers that are different block sizes in length.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 다른 버퍼에에서 블록 크기 길이 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1. If CanMergeBlocks is **false**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>. If CanMergeBlocks is **true**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: `clearText` 및 `cipherText` 에 전달 된 버퍼 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>및 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>n 해야* <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> 바이트 길이가 여기서 ' n '은 1 보다 크거나 정수입니다.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> CanMergeBlocks 이면 * *false**, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> 에 전달 된 버퍼와 같은 길이 여야</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> 에 전달 된 버퍼 CanMergeBlocks 이면 * *true**에 전달 된 버퍼 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>에 전달 된 버퍼에서 길이가 다를 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(모든 버퍼 크기의 배수 여야 여전히 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>의 길이 바이트).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> can be a different length from the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*>; otherwise, **false** if the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> must be the exact same length.
trans-unit.target: **true** 버퍼에 전달 하는 경우 <> </> *>에 전달 된 버퍼에서 길이가 다를 수 있습니다 <> </> *> 고, 그렇지 않으면, **false** 버퍼에 전달 하는 경우 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 동일한 길이 해당 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] the default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] 기본값은 **true**합니다.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts cipher text to clear text.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 일반 텍스트로 암호화를 해독 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 해독할 암호화 텍스트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The decrypted clear text of cryptoText.
trans-unit.target: 암호 해독 된 일반 텍스트 cryptoText 합니다.

trans-unit.source: cipherText is null.
trans-unit.target: cipherTextnull입니다.

trans-unit.source: Decryption right not granted.
trans-unit.target: 암호 해독 권한이 허가 되지 않았습니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dispose performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Dispose 수행 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> 를 사용 하 여 작업을 마쳤으면 Dispose를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>불안정 한 상태가.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dispose를 호출한 후에 대 한 모든 참조를 해제 해야는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>차지한.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [Dispose 메서드를 구현](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에 항상 호출 삭제

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref> 관리 되는 리소스를 선택적으로 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 public `Dispose()`메서드 및 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`보호 된 호출 `Dispose(Boolean)` 메서드는 `disposing` 매개 변수 설정 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>호출 `Dispose` 와 `disposing` 로 설정 `false`합니다.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> references.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `disposing` 매개 변수가 true 이면이 메서드는 관리 개체가 보유 하는 모든 리소스를 해제 합니다.이 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>참조.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 호출에서 `Dispose()` 각 참조 된 개체의 메서드.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>관리 되는 관리 되지 않는 리소스만 해제 하려면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 만 관리 되지 않는 리소스를 해제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts clear text to cipher text.
trans-unit.target: 일반 텍스트를 암호화 텍스트로 암호화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The byte length of the `clearText` buffer should be a multiple of the cipher <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 바이트 길이 `clearText` 버퍼는 암호의 배수 여야 하며 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>속성.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital rights management system uses [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] block cipher.
trans-unit.target: 디지털 권한 관리 시스템 사용 하 여 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] 블록 암호화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: With [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], blocks are encrypted independently such that two blocks of identical clear text produce identical cipher text results.
trans-unit.target: 와 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], 동일한 암호화 텍스트 결과 생성 되는 두 개의 블록의 동일한 일반 텍스트가 블록 독립적으로 암호화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To minimize potential decryption threats from independent block encryption, applications should employ methods to modify content, such as compression, to avoid encrypting identical clear text blocks.
trans-unit.target: 독립적인 블록 암호화에서 잠재적인 암호 해독 위협을 최소화 하기 위해 응용 프로그램에는 동일한 일반 텍스트 블록이 암호화 되지 않게 압축 등의 콘텐츠를 수정 하는 방법을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The clear text content to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 일반 텍스트 콘텐츠를 암호화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted cipher text of the given clearText.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 된 암호 텍스트는 주어진 clearText 합니다.

trans-unit.source: clearText is null.
trans-unit.target: clearTextnull입니다.

trans-unit.source: Encryption is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 허용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs internal cleanup before the instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 리소스를 해제 하 고 인스턴스가 가비지 수집에 의해 회수 되기 전에 내부 정리를 수행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Finalize performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 마무리 수행 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 재정의 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 코드,이 메서드를 호출 하지 않아야 개체의 `Finalize` 메서드를 호출 하 여 가비지 수집기의 종료를 사용 하지 않도록 설정 된 경우가 아니면 자동으로 가비지 수집 중 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Finalize 메서드 및 소멸자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [관리 되지 않는 리소스 정리](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), 및 [Finalize 메서드를 재정의](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)합니다.
